Hierarchy

Members

protected

  • $apiUrl
    API credential information required to execute requests

  • $authPassword

  • $records — tvorwachs\ClouDNS\Api\RecordsApi
  • $sslCheck
    Verify SSL connection

    storage for API responses

Methods

public

  • deleteZone() — This function is available only for slave zones, master zones and cloud/bulk domains. Works with reverse zones too.
  • getUpdateStatusZone() — Get a list with name servers and information for update status of the domain name. Works with reverse zones too.
  • getZoneInfo() — Get zone information, like status, is it master or slave, is it forward or reverse, is it a cloud domain and which zone is its master
  • isZoneUpdated() — Get a list with name servers and information for update status of the domain name. Works with reverse zones too.
  • listMailForwardStats() — Get the count of the mail servers you have and the mail forwards limit.
  • listZoneStats() — Gets the number of the zones you have and the zone limit of your customer plan. Reverse zones are included.
  • listZones() — Gets a list with zones you have or zone names matching a keyword. The method works with pagination. Reverse zones are included.
  • records()
  • registerZone() — This function registers a domain zone.
  • setZoneStatus() — Get a list with name servers and information for update status of the domain name. Works with reverse zones too.
  • updateZone() — Update zone

Inherited from tvorwachs\ClouDNS\Connection

protected

  • connect() — Runs the final connection with all the data needed
  • getAuth() — Returns the GET array to be used for authentication
  • getDomain()
  • login() — Test login details
  • url_encode() — This section takes the input fields and converts them to the proper format for an http post. For example: "auth_id=username&auth_password=a1B2c3D4"

public

  • setOptions() — Pass in options to set as an array
